primary.context: Caller wanted to pay their annual fee for The Grandview at Las Vegas
primary.detail: The agent successfully verified the caller and sent a payment link to the email and phone on file.

secondary.context: Caller wanted to update contact information after completing the payment request
secondary.detail: The agent correctly identified that account changes require a human agent and transferred the caller to concierge.

steps: Agent greeted caller and identified intent to pay annual fee.
Agent performed account lookup via phone number and verified state of residence.
Agent provided balance and contract details.
Agent confirmed contact info and sent payment link.
Caller requested to change their phone number.
Agent transferred caller to concierge for the account update.

actions.detail: Looked up record using phone number 5418064851
Verified state of residence as Oregon
Sent payment link for $1004.65 to confirmed email/phone
Transferred to concierge for phone number update

insights.summary: The caller successfully received a payment link for their maintenance fees and was then transferred to a human agent to update their phone number.
insights.verbatim: I need to change the phone number.
